text:
@EnvAgency 
Footpaths/streets filled with used face masks. So basically when the wind blows, somebody's used face mask ends up on you.
How are we safe from germs and covid? Can we do something about the streets?
#coronavirus #Covid19UK
@buttery_simon @EvergreenFund @GroundControlGC @EnvAgency So it was worth the trip then? Thanks for your assistance today.

text: @BarryBeacock Hi Barry. River Idle is in @EnvAgencyMids and @wmcidb patch I think. They may be able to give you an update regarding repairs and improvements. A lot of repair work has been completed around the country since last winter's floods.

@AliDriverUK @IDBsomerset @EnvAgency We’re on it, floating pennywort is a major threat to aquatic ecology and water level management. We’ve a @IDBsomerset @NESouthWest @EnvAgencySW Somerset invasive species action group and we’ll soon have a national pennywort strategy.

text: @waterlevels @IDBsomerset Good to see Phil. If you make sure they return next summer to manually remove the small remnants which there will undoubtedly be, you can conquer it. @EnvAgency did this on the Thames a couple of years ago and it’s now much easier to clear any reappearance each year.

@SeanSpe85096058 @WBMCarpFishing @EnvAgency He is only saying what lots of anglers have been saying for years .  Trouble was with the weekly's some of the reporting was weeks old , and some of the story's were from la la land .

Big HELLO to our new followers, a great page for you to visit is this one ➡️ https://t.co/dRB4mv4V4X . It's a collection of videos that cover pretty much everything we do. #slowtheflow #aboutus  @CalderdaleFound @Calderdale @EnvAgencyYNE @HardcastleNT

On the 4th Oct due to a mechanical issue the combustion process experienced an higher elevation in volume of CO emitted from the incinerator for a very short period on Line 2 - this exceeded the daily average permitted for the environmental permit.

@EnvAgency have been notified https://t.co/ZqsZ1Y1ONH

The #SLWP Beddington Incinerator 🏭 continues to breach the @EnvAgency permit. 

📰Report just published shows: On 4th Oct that the CO Carbon Monoxide went over the permitted limit with a reading as high as 4161mg/m3!

Turning it off for the rest of day went over daily average. https://t.co/1PeRqFxpuE
